data.title: Top 23 Accounting Conferences to Attend in 2024
data.meta_description: If you own an accounting/CPA or bookkeeping firm, here are the top 23 accounting conferences to attend in 2024 to scale your firm.
data.text:
Taking your accounting firm to the next level requires you to make certain investments in your professional development.

One of the best ways to do this is by attending conferences.

These conferences provide opportunities to learn from other industry experts, network with other professionals, discover new technologies, and stay up to date on the latest trends in the field —all of which will help you scale your firm.

Moreover, partaking in these events is a great way to earn free CPE credits to maintain your certification and practice license. In essence, you get to learn while fulfilling your professional requirements.

A win-win situation!

In 2024, some must-attend conferences should be on your calendar. So, in this article, we’ve compiled the top 23 accounting events you should consider attending in 2024.

Let’s dive in.

How We Created The List of Top Conferences

To develop a fair and truly valuable list, we considered the following factors.

The Organizers: The organizers’ reputation and experience determine the quality of the event. For any conference to benefit your firm, the organizers need to know the industry well enough to create programs that address real problems. So, we looked for conferences that reputable professional associations and thought leaders who have influenced developments in the industry for years are coordinating.

The Target Audience: The conference’s target audience determines the invited speakers, program schedule, venue, etc. We restricted the list to only events empowering accounting/CPA/bookkeeping firm founders and team leaders to overcome pressing challenges and advance their firms.

Past Attendee Testimonials: Who better to speak about the value of a conference than past attendees? To estimate these conferences’ impact on your firm, we snooped around to see what past attendees are saying about each of them. And only included those with glowing reviews.

Networking Opportunities: Networking is a key benefit of attending these events. Because of that, we prioritized events that provide ample opportunities to mingle via breakout sessions, social activities, etc.

CPE/CPD Credits: We also added conferences offering CPE or CPD credits so attendees can kill two birds with one stone.

You may also be interested in the best accounting practice management software options in 2024.

Best 23 Accounting Conferences to Attend in 2024

Here’s our list of top Accounting Conferences to attend in 2024 to attend:

Scaling New Heights 2024

AICPA & CIMA ENGAGE 2024

Intuit Connect 2024 (formerly QuickBooks Connect)

Synergy 2024

Xerocon 2024

AccountingWeb Live Expo

Digital CPA 2024

WorkflowCon 2024

Digital Accountancy Show 2024

Accounting Business Expo

TAXPOSIUM 2024

2024 Women Who Count Conference

AICPA & CIMA Not-for-Profit Industry Conference

BKX 2024

Latino Tax Fest

NASBA 117th Annual Meeting

American Accounting Association (AAA) Annual Meeting

IRS Nationwide Tax Forum

AFP 2024

Sage Transform 2024

Accounts Payable Conference & P2P Expo 2024

Reframe 2024

Ensuring Success 2024

1. Scaling New Heights 2024

Scaling New Heights is the place to be if you want to overcome friction like process inefficiencies, limited capacity, dated technologies, and collaboration challenges in your accounting firm.

This year’s theme is “Boldly! Go”, and the program will explore topics like:

Practice advancement,

General ledger training (technology),

General business software (technology),

Tax preparation and advisory,

Professional and personal development,

Speaking and writing skills.

Why You Should Attend

You’ll get to test accounting software solutions like QBO, Xero, and Zoho Books to see if they can improve your accounting processes and systems.

Opportunity to hear from Keynote speaker Michio Kaku, an esteemed theoretical physicist. He’ll talk about the potential impacts of quantum technology on the accounting industry to help you prepare for the future.

You’re one bookkeeping course away from unlocking your next phase of accounting success. Whatever your skill level may be.

But there are more bookkeeping courses than your schedule can take. On a bad day, you may even end up spending the time you don’t have on a course you don’t need.

We want to help you prevent that.

This list of bookkeeping courses will improve your bookkeeping performance. Whether you’re a job seeker or an experienced bookkeeper.

Conferences are Investments in Your Firm

The techniques that brought you here can’t take you where you want to be. With technologies changing how businesses and accounting firms operate, you must keep up with industry developments.

Accounting conferences are opportunities to keep up with regulations, tech innovations, and revenue opportunities to avoid breaking the law or missing growth opportunities.

These conferences will help you build the firm of your dreams by offering personal and professional development courses and other prized resources.

One event you should put on your calendar this year is WorkflowCon 2024 by Financial Cents. We’ll soon release details on how to register and attend, but it’s sure to be another explosive event.

Onboard Your Staff and Manage Your Team with Financial Cents.
